about_the_game:
Stranded With Darkness is a first person, co-op survival horror game for up to 4 players online.

When your escape pod gets stranded on a distant desert like planet. You find yourself racing against time. Even though the planet seems mostly dead during the day, its a different story when the sun goes down. You realize you are no longer alone... The habitants of the planet do not like your presence and will do everything they can to silence your call for aid. Defend your radio beacon at all costs and hope someone arrives before its to late to get you and your crew of this forsaken planet...

                   

Included in Early Access version at launch:

  • 1 map (Desert Planet)

  • 4 Materials to build from

  • 1 game mode (Endless Survival with high score)

  • 2 Monster types

  • 1-4 Online CO-OP

    *More maps and content will be included in future updates.

KEY FEATURES

  • Cooperate: Stranded With Darkness is a 1-4 player cooperative experience where you must work together to build and defend your only chance of survival. Stay out of the dark, stay close to your crew and make sure you keep breathing long enough to see the sun rise once more.

  • Explore: Explore the planet for different materials and to improve your defenses. BUT! Make sure you have enough time to get back before darkness falls. It's easy to get lost and stranded... 

  • Base building: Build a base to defend the beacon, find different ways to make the most out of the material you have. Only traps isn't always the best defense! Test different strategies.

  • Survive or Fail: There are only two ways out, survive until someone finds your call for aid, or become part of the planet....

content_descriptors.notes: Alien bugs will attack your base and you need to kill them. No blood involved

short_description: From an Indie developer in Sweden we bring you Stranded With Darkness. A base building tower-defense like game, with up to 4 player online CO-OP. Stranded on a desert like planet, gather resources during the day, defend the SOS transmitter during the night. Survive as many days as possible.
